alert.carry-chest-limit: 더 이상 상자를 운반할 수 없습니다.
alert.command-backup.invalid-context: Must be in game to show backups.
alert.mod-disabled: Disabled Carry Chests. Press {{button}} to enable.
alert.mod-enabled: Enabled Carry Chests. Press {{button}} to disable.
command.carry-chests.description: Type 'carry_chests help' to list available commands.
command.backups.description: Open a menu showing backup copies of all carried chests.
command.unknown.description: That is not a valid command.
config-option.enabled.name: Enabled
config-option.enabled.description: Global toggle to enable or disable the mod.
config-option.grab-empty-as-item.name: Grab Empty as Item
config-option.grab-empty-as-item.descrip: Grab empty chests as items so that they are able to stack.
config-option.maximum-reach.name: Maximum Reach
config-option.maximum-reach.description: The number of tiles away that a chest can be grabbed.
config-option.open-held-chest.name: Open Held Chests
config-option.open-held-chest.descriptio: Allow you to open the currently held chest.
config-option.override-toool.name: Override Tool
config-option.override-tool.description: Override using a tool on a chest to pick it up.
config-option.total-limit.name: 상자 운반 한도
config-option.total-limit.description: 한 번에 운반할 수 있는 상자의 수를 제한합니다.
config-option.slowness-amount.name: 속도 감소량
config-option.slowness-amount.descriptio: 한도 이상의 상자를 운반할 때 적용되는 속도 감소량.
config-option.slowness-limit.name: 속도 한도
config-option.slowness-limit.description: 속도 감소 효과가 적용되기 전에 운반할 수 있는 상자의 수
config-option.swap-chests.name: Swap Chests
config-option.swap-chests.description: Using a chest on a placed chest will combine inventories and swap them.
config-option.toggle-enabled.name: Toggle Enabled
config-option.toggle-enabled.description: Assign a keybind to toggle the mod on or off.
